chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
I was supposed to receive the package on May 28th. Apparently, it couldn't be delivered because someone was home all day and waited for it. The delivery person didn't ring the doorbell. According to the tracking information, the package should have been delivered to the nearest UPS access point that same day. At the access point, allegedly, the package couldn't be handed over because the UPS office was closed that day. However, I called the access point the same day and it was open normally. It was said then that a re-delivery attempt would take place at the UPS access point the next day (May 29th). Four days have passed since then, but the package status has not changed. No delivery attempts were made by UPS.

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Olga - Back Market

Dear ecomobile

Files already released for your investigation.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

Customer wants a replacement, please.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The CND submitted is invalid, as the details need to be handwritten. Kindly ask the customer to resubmit the handwritten CND. Meanwhile, we will check with our logistics partner on the status of the shipment. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Files released 

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have been informed by our logistics partner that the delivery company was closed and the delivery will be made soon. Kindly get back to us soon on whether the customer receives the package.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner has mentioned that they have delivered the product on 5th June. Please check with the customer if they are able to receive it.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message.

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

Please send me a valid TN for the replacement device today, or I will refund the customer.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Our logistics partner updated that the parcel was supposed to be shipped out to the collection point on the 5th of June . We are currently confirming with our logistics partner if it has been delivered. Hence, in the meantime we are not sending a replacement device. We will update you as soon as we get a reply from our logistics partner. Please DO NOT REFUND the customer in the meantime as the parcel is not lost.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

call the parcel back if you want, but I will initiate the refund. 

Customer has waited long enough!

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

On 11 June, the customer received a notification that his parcel was ready for collection at a UPS Access Point, and he went there to collect it.

When he received the parcel, he saw that the parcel was quite damaged and immediately took pictures. (released already)

It turned out that the parcel was empty, it only contained the charging cable, nothing else.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We're working with our logistics partner to resolve this issue. They have requested the following documentation:

1. Handwritten, signed, and completed BackMarket CND form.
2. A police report that includes your order and parcel tracking number.
3. Photograph of the shipping label on the parcel.
4. Photographs of all four sides of the parcel.
5. Photographs of all four sides of the box or its contents.
6. Any messages the customer wrote on the delivery note

Regards,
JH

Hello ecomobile, 

Please kindly refer to the Seller Support Centre (SSC) if you would like further clarification on this topic. You should easily find the answers to your questions there. Just click on this link and you will be taken to the home page of your help centre: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/login

Under "Top categories" select the category that fits your issue and an article has most likely already been written on this topic. If the help centre articles do not provide you the answers you were looking for, you can directly reach out to your SSC team by clicking on "Submit a new request" and you will receive an answer within 24 working hours. Click on this link to be redirected to the form: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/submit-new-request

You can monitor your requests by clicking on the tab "My existing requests".

*** Reminder: If this is the first time you go to the SSC, you must create a new account as this is a separate platform. You can use the same credentials as your Back Office, if you want, or different ones if you prefer.

We hope this helps!
Have a lovely day!

Celia-Cristina from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Please send us the following documentation:

1. Handwritten, signed, and completed BackMarket CND form.
2. A police report that includes your order and parcel tracking number.
3. Photograph of the shipping label on the parcel.
4. Photographs of all four sides of the parcel.
5. Photographs of all four sides of the box or its contents.
6. Any messages the customer wrote on the delivery note

We cannot continue with the investigation without any of these documents

Regards,
JH
Please request the customer to keep the parcel in the meantime.

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Tania, Back Market Customer Care
